haibison.android.lockpattern.utils

Class LoadingView<Params,Progress,Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>
      • haibison.android.lockpattern.utils.LoadingView<Params,Progress,Result>

  • public abstract class LoadingView<Params,Progress,Result>
extends AsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result>
    An implementation of AsyncTask, used to show a view while doing some background tasks, then hide it when done.

        protected void setLastException(Throwable t)
